## Part I: Data Engineering (Weeks 1-5)

### Week 1: Data Collection

Build robust data collection pipelines using HTTP APIs and web scraping.

**Key Tools:** Chrome DevTools, curl, requests, BeautifulSoup, Playwright

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week01-data-collection-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week01-data-collection-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week01-data-collection-lecture.md))
  - HTTP fundamentals, REST APIs, Rate limiting, Web scraping strategies
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week01-data-collection-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week01-data-collection-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week01-data-collection-lab.md))
  - Build a movie data collector using OMDb API and IMDb scraping

---

### Week 2: Data Validation & Quality

Ensure data integrity through validation schemas and cleaning pipelines.

**Key Tools:** jq, csvkit, Pydantic, pandas

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week02-data-validation-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week02-data-validation-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week02-data-validation-lecture.md))
  - CLI inspection tools, Schema validation with Pydantic, Data drift detection
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week02-data-validation-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week02-data-validation-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week02-data-validation-lab.md))
  - Validate and clean movie dataset, Fix type mismatches and missing values

---

### Week 3: Data Labeling & Annotation

Set up annotation workflows and measure inter-annotator agreement.

**Key Tools:** Label Studio, Cohen's Kappa, CVAT

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week03-data-labeling-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week03-data-labeling-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week03-data-labeling-lecture.md))
  - Annotation types, Label Studio setup, Agreement metrics, Quality assurance
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week03-data-labeling-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week03-data-labeling-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week03-data-labeling-lab.md))
  - Configure Label Studio for sentiment analysis, Calculate Kappa scores

---

### Week 4: Active Learning

Reduce labeling costs using intelligent query strategies.

**Key Tools:** modAL, scikit-learn

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week04-active-learning-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week04-active-learning-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week04-active-learning-lecture.md))
  - Uncertainty sampling, Query-by-committee, Learning curves
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week04-active-learning-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week04-active-learning-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week04-active-learning-lab.md))
  - Implement active learning strategies, Compare cost savings

---

### Week 5: Data Augmentation

Expand training datasets through synthetic transformations.

**Key Tools:** Albumentations, nlpaug, audiomentations

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week05-data-augmentation-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week05-data-augmentation-lecture.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week05-data-augmentation-lecture.md))
  - Image, text, and audio augmentation, AutoAugment, Test-time augmentation
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week05-data-augmentation-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week05-data-augmentation-lab.html) | [Source](https://github.com/nipunbatra/stt-ai-teaching/blob/master/slides/week05-data-augmentation-lab.md))
  - Apply transforms, Measure performance impact

---

## Part II: Model Development & Deployment (Weeks 6-11)

### Week 6: LLM APIs & Multimodal AI

Leverage foundation models for text, vision, and audio tasks.

**Key Tools:** Gemini API, OpenAI API, Anthropic Claude

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week06-llm-apis-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week06-llm-apis-lecture.html))
  - API setup, Prompt engineering, Vision and audio models
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week06-llm-apis-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week06-llm-apis-lab.html))
  - Sentiment analysis, OCR, Audio transcription

---

### Week 7: Model Development & Training

Train and evaluate machine learning models effectively.

**Key Tools:** scikit-learn, AutoGluon, PyTorch, LoRA

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week07-model-development-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week07-model-development-lecture.html))
  - Baseline models, Cross-validation, AutoML, Transfer learning, LLM fine-tuning
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week07-model-development-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week07-model-development-lab.html))
  - Train pipelines, Use AutoGluon, Fine-tune models

---

### Week 8: Reproducibility & Environments

Ensure experiments are reproducible and shareable.

**Key Tools:** Docker, DVC, MLflow, Weights & Biases

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week08-reproducibility-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week08-reproducibility-lecture.html))
  - Virtual environments, Docker containers, Data versioning, Experiment tracking
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week08-reproducibility-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week08-reproducibility-lab.html))
  - Create Dockerfiles, Version data with DVC, Track with MLflow

---

### Week 9: Interactive AI Demos

Build and deploy interactive AI applications.

**Key Tools:** Streamlit, Gradio, Hugging Face Spaces

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week09-interactive-demos-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week09-interactive-demos-lecture.html))
  - Streamlit apps, Gradio interfaces, State management, Deployment
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week09-interactive-demos-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week09-interactive-demos-lab.html))
  - Build a GenAI dashboard, Deploy to HF Spaces

---

### Week 10: HTTP, APIs & FastAPI

Develop production-grade ML APIs.

**Key Tools:** FastAPI, curl, Pydantic

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week10-http-apis-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week10-http-apis-lecture.html))
  - HTTP fundamentals, FastAPI basics, Serving ML models
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week10-http-apis-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week10-http-apis-lab.html))
  - Build a robust FastAPI service, Input validation

---

### Week 11: Git, GitHub Actions & CI/CD

Automate testing and deployment with CI/CD pipelines.

**Key Tools:** PyGithub, GitHub Actions, pytest

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week11-git-cicd-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week11-git-cicd-lecture.html))
  - Git automation, GitHub API, CI/CD workflows, Testing strategies
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week11-git-cicd-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week11-git-cicd-lab.html))
  - Build an AI code reviewer, Set up CI pipeline

---

## Part III: Optimization & Production (Weeks 12-15)

### Week 12: Deployment on Constrained Devices

Optimize models for edge devices and mobile.

**Key Tools:** ONNX, Quantization, Pruning

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week12-deployment-constrained-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week12-deployment-constrained-lecture.html))
  - Model compression, Quantization techniques, ONNX Runtime
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week12-deployment-constrained-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week12-deployment-constrained-lab.html))
  - Quantize and prune models, Convert to ONNX

---

### Week 13: Profiling & Optimization

Identify and fix performance bottlenecks.

**Key Tools:** PyTorch Profiler, NVIDIA Nsight, AMP

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week13-profiling-optimization-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week13-profiling-optimization-lecture.html))
  - GPU profiling, Mixed precision training, Knowledge distillation
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week13-profiling-optimization-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week13-profiling-optimization-lab.html))
  - Profile training loops, Implement AMP, Distill models

---

### Week 14: Model Monitoring & Observability

Detect and respond to model degradation in production.

**Key Tools:** Evidently AI, Prometheus, Data drift detection

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week14-model-monitoring-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week14-model-monitoring-lecture.html))
  - Data drift, Concept drift, Statistical tests, Monitoring dashboards
- **Lab** ([PDF](pdf/week14-model-monitoring-lab.pdf) | [HTML](html/week14-model-monitoring-lab.html))
  - Simulate drift, Generate reports, Set up alerts

---

### Week 15: Course Summary & Future Trends

Review the ML pipeline and explore emerging topics.

**Key Topics:** LLMOps, AI Agents, Edge AI, Final Projects

- **Lecture** ([PDF](pdf/week15-course-summary-lecture.pdf) | [HTML](html/week15-course-summary-lecture.html))
  - Complete pipeline review, Advanced topics, Future of AI engineering
